Welcome to the Help menu.

Navigation
1
Next Button - Clicking this button will take you to the next screen of the current lesson.
2
Main Menu - Clicking this button will allow you to jump to other areas in the same course.
3
Back Button - Clicking this button will take you to the previous screen of the current lesson.
4
Progress Bar - This feature allows you to see what percentage of the current Module you have completed.
5
Replay Button - When active, this button allows you to restart the animation on the current page from the beginning.
6
Play/Pause Button - When active, this toggle button allows you to play and pause the animation on the current page.
7
Mute Button - This allows the user to mute and unmute all audio being played in the course.
8
Topic Title - This shows the name of the current topic.
